actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Middle East and South Asia .

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Middle East and South Asia

official_title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the people of Baluchistan, currently divided between Pakistan, Iran, and Afghanistan, have the right to self-determination and to their own sovereign country.
subjects: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the people of Baluchistan, currently divided between Pakistan, Iran, and Afghanistan, have the right to self-determination and to their own sovereign country and they should be afforded the opportunity to choose their own status without external coercion.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the people of Baluchistan, currently divided between Pakistan, Iran, and Afghanistan, have the right to self-determination and to their own sovereign country.
